document.full_text: britain's road to economic recovery will be rocky but the coalition government is as committed as ever to slashing a record budget deficit, finance minister george osborne said on wednesday.
document.title: osborne says british recovery choppy, coalition solid
lines_and_colors: britain's road to economic recovery will be rocky but the coalition government is as committed as ever to slashing a record budget deficit, finance minister george osborne said on wednesday.
